info.name: Quota warning
info.summary: This app sends notifications to users when they reached 85, 90 and 95% of their quota.
info.description: This app sends notifications to users when they reached 85, 90 and 95% of their quota (checked once a day). In addition an email can be sent to the users. The three percentages can be changed in the admin settings. It is also possible to have a link in the email and the notification for upsell options.
info.author: Joas Schilling
